cause.description:
How about we give a little to a man who gave so much to ur and our school. He always wanted to be remembered as a simple school teacher, and that he will be.
This is for you Mr. Robert Hobdy
1. We should show Mr. Hobdy's family how much of an impact he actually had
2. To show them how much we care
3. For us to finally give back to a man who gave so much
cause.mission: relieve the families stress, and provide more time to mourn over the loss.
cause.name: Mr. Hobdy's Wake
